text:
Hello,
I am looking for help or advice on importing a WordPress Blog to HubSpot.
Tried it out in the Sandbox, worked like a charm.
I noticed however that all the INSIDE links retained their Wordpress version with trailing slashes.

Did I miss something in the migration process ?? or will we have to manually edit every blog article to correct these ? :smiling_face_with_tear:
I imagine that selecting the new HubSpot Page instead of using the hard link would be the way to go.

Better yet if we could get HubSpot to add those trailing slashes, the migration without redirects would be top :slightly_smiling_face:

Any ideas or advice would be greatly appreciated.
